amendment.description: To remove the requirement that the Secretary must hold coastal impact assistance payments in escrow in certain circumstances.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1398 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1398 proposed by Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S9942-9943; text: CR S9942) To remove the requirement that the Secretary must hold coastal impact assistance payments in escrow in certain circumstances.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1398 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1398 proposed by Senator Domenici.
